input.sentences: having a birthday on christmas eve can be tough | but we try hard to make it a special day for [female] .
we have a party in the morning | to not confuse it with the rest of the day . [female] loved her barbie lego castle !
we always have a cake and candles | without a christmas theme .
the kids all gather at the table early in the day for the cake .
output.sentences: Birthday morning and time to open presents.
The girl got a beautiful Lego princess castle.
They all sat around the table to have some birthday cake.
Her youner sister got some cake too.
